overview:
Hazel Cameron is a managing director of Cross Atlantic Capital Partners and Chairman Network Director at LDC. Prior to Cross Atlantic, Hazel was at Bowman Capital’s European venture capital arm. Hazel was early at 3i in its Scottish office having qualified as a chartered accountant with Arthur Andersen and then worked at British Linen Bank, the merchant bank of the Bank of Scotland.

She is a member of the Institute of Chartered Accountants and holds a Bachelor of Accountancy degree with honors from Glasgow University.
